<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goblin Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=50) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 49 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Goblin Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [dogslicer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=49), [horsechopper](/Weapons.aspx?ID=53), and all [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
